Package platform

Class Book

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
platform.SpecialPlatform
platform.Book
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, Collectable
public class Book extends SpecialPlatform implements Collectable
Book class is a class that tells the player that player can walk through this class' object and you need to collect all of the books to win a level. This class also implements Collectable as a Marker interface
Author:
Mos

  • Constructor Details

    • Book

      public Book​(javafx.scene.image.Image image, int fitWidth, int fitHeight, int translateX, int translateY)
      The constructor pass first three parameter into super constructor, and the last two parameters will be used to setTranslate.
      Parameters:
      image - Block's image
      fitWidth - Used to set block's fitWidth
      fitHeight - Used to set block's fitHeight
      translateX - Used to set blocks positionX
      translateY - Used to set blocks positionY
